about_the_game:
" Steinhardt's Guide to the Eldritch Hunt is adapted from the 500 page grimoire fusing Soulsborne and Lovecraftian inspirations.

Enhance your 5E game with nightmarish monsters, eldritch moons, and the ever-looming threat of madness.

Create an unforgettable narrative as you lay waste to eldritch spawn with an arsenal of trick weapons, blasphemous magic, and twisted player options.


Here's What's Inside:

  • ALL-NEW MADNESS SYSTEM WITH OVER 300 INSANE FLAWS AND BOONS
  • UNIQUE LUNAR PHASE MECHANIC WITH 12 WORLD-ALTERING MOONS
  • 5 GRIMDARK ADVENTURES
  • 15+ TWISTED RACE OPTIONS
  • 15+ NIGHTMARISH SUBCLASSES (One or two for each class)
  • THE JAEGER CLASS (A hunter that unleashes steel and gunpowder in a whirlwind of blood) COMPLETE WITH 4 SUBCLASSES
  • 20+ FULLY-ILLUSTRATED TRICK WEAPONS AND EXPANDED FIREARMS
  • 50+ MACABRE MONSTERS, FALLEN COMRADES, AND SPAWN OF THE OLD ONES
ONE SUREFIRE WAY TO CRAFT A BLOODY, GOTHIC ADVENTURE WITH YOUR FRIENDS. (and the complete Lore of Luyarnha, a Victorian City fallen to the Scourge) "
